title: Bug 117981: Unable to select any item on initial attempt in library outline view
description:
Description: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view, the item cannot be selected on the first attempt.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label to a library file.
2. Open the library outline view.
3. Attempt to select the label item in the library outline view.

Observed Behavior (OB): The focus jumps to the library file node in the outline view instead of allowing the label item to be selected.
Expected Behavior (EB): The label item in the library outline view should be selectable upon the first attempt.
Steps to Reproduce (SR):
1. Add a label to a library file.
2. Open the library outline view.
3. Try to select the label item in the library outline view. It should be selectable without jumping to the library file node.
